clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Macitentan is indicated for patients with pulmonary arterial hypertension

contraindications.disease: Macitentan has a black box warning of embryo fetal toxicity Special precautions must be taken for all females of child bearing age and women who are pregnant must not be given macitentan
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Macitentan blocks simulators of hypertrophy inflammation fibrosis proliferation and vasoconstriction
